attributes.additional_details:
Place a trade embargo on Argentina for it's disgraceful treatment towards the UK, the Falkland Islands and other soverientys.

The banning of Falklands and UK Flagged ships and ships that have visited the Falkland Islands is unacceptable.

The restriction of flights over Argentinian airspace for Falkland Island flights is disgraceful.

As is the bullying and thuggery involved in the cruise industry to try stop Falkland tourism and the behaviour towards its fishing boats and oil exploration.

This country has more outstanding trade complaints than any other country in the world and it is high time someone stood up to this country and it's governments belligerence.

The economic strangling of our citizens and the political pressures put on them has to stop!
